Title: Relates to student financial aid programs
Summary: Relates to student financial aid programs; allows absence because of uniformed service, maternity/paternity, FMLA, or due to compensable injury to be creditable time.
LawCode: Amd ยง605, add Art 14 Part 2 Subpart 4 ยง679-k, Ed L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to student financial aid programs
